verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَرَءَيْتَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14568'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14361'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Видал ли ты того, Кто отвергает Воздаянье

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14654'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى يَدُعُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14655'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَت<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مَ
verses.translation: Таков лишь тот, кто отгоняет сироту

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13901'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمِسْك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Откажет в пище он тому, кто голодает

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَوَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14656'>لٌ ل</tajweed>ِّلْمُصَلّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ

ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14657'>ن ص</tajweed>َلَاتِهِمْ سَاه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ

ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓء<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ

وَيَمْنَعُونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14658'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَاع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: А ближнему откажет в самом малом
